definitions.definition: a mixture of uncooked vegetables, usually including lettuce, eaten either as a separate dish or with other food:
examples: Toss (= mix) the salad with a vinaigrette dressing.

definitions.definition: cooked or uncooked vegetables cut into very small pieces and often mixed with mayonnaise:
a salad made with tuna, cheese, egg, etc. and lettuce or other cold ingredients:
examples: She had a tuna salad for lunch.

definitions.definition: tuna, cheese, egg, etc. mixed with mayonnaise, used to make a sandwich:
examples: I'll have egg salad on brown (bread), please.
